remarks: Two ways to express "exclusive or" between decidable propositions. Theorem *5.22 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124, but for decidable propositions.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-May-2018.)
statement: xordc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( -. ( ph <-> ps ) <-> ( ( ph /\ -. ps ) \/ ( ps /\ -. ph ) ) ) ) ) $.
